title: Pets Ok 1 bed on Comm ave-Ht/Hw incl-On Train,66 bus
posting_body: Rent Includes:: Gas, Heat, Hot Water
Front facing unit, great space, lots of light.
Rent includes heat, hot water and cooking gas.
Hardwood floors, laundry in basement, storage units may be available for rent ($25), parking spaces available for $150/ mth depending on availability.
Pet friendly (with breed restrictions) for additional monthly cost of $50
